languages.text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан предложил обратить оружие повстанцев против них самих. Их преимуществом была скрытная диверсионная тактика налетов. Почтенный Абеляр выразил уверенность, что смог бы преподать основы этой тактики солдатам планетарного гарнизона, уравняв их шансы против мятежников.

traits.locale_text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан предложил обратить оружие повстанцев против них самих. Их преимуществом была скрытная диверсионная тактика налетов. Почтенный Абеляр выразил уверенность, что смог бы преподать основы этой тактики силам планетарной обороны, уравняв их шансы против мятежников.

languages.text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.
languages.original_text: Почтенный Абеляр Версериан предложил обратить оружие повстанцев против них самих. Их преимуществом была скрытная диверсионная тактика налетов. Почтенный Абеляр выразил уверенность, что смог бы преподать основы этой тактики солдатам планетарного гарнизона, уравняв их шансы против мятежников.

traits.locale_text: The esteemed Abelard Verserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the planetary defense forces, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

The esteemed Abelard Verserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the planetary defense forces, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

languages.text: 誉れ高きアベラルド・ウェルザリアンは反乱軍が使っていた武器をこちらで利用するよう提案した。反乱軍がジャングルの茂みで展開するゲリラ戦術で強みを発揮する武器だからだ。誉れ高きアベラルドは、こうした戦術の基礎を惑星守備隊の兵士に教えることで、反乱軍を潰せると確信していた。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

traits.locale_text: 誉れ高きアベラルド・ウェルザリアンは反乱軍が使っていた武器をこちらで利用するよう提案した。反乱軍がジャングルの茂みで展開するゲリラ戦術で強みを発揮する武器だからだ。誉れ高きアベラルドは、こうした戦術の基礎を惑星守備隊の兵士に教えることで、反乱軍を潰せると確信していた。

languages.text: 德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森提议，用叛军自己的战术来对付他们。叛军的优势在于隐蔽的游击战术，而德高望重的阿贝拉德深信，他可以将游击战术的基础知识传授给行星驻军，从而消除叛军在这方面的优势。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

traits.locale_text: 德高望重的阿贝拉德·韦尔森提议，用叛军自己的战术来对付他们。叛军的优势在于隐蔽的游击战术，而德高望重的阿贝拉德深信，他可以将游击战术的基础知识传授给行星驻军，从而消除叛军在这方面的优势。

languages.text: El estimado Abelard Werserian propuso utilizar las armas de los rebeldes contra ellos mismos. Su fortaleza residía en las tácticas de guerrilla que empleaban en sus ataques. El estimado Abelard se afirmó en su convicción de que podía inculcar los rudimentos de estas tácticas a los soldados de la guarnición planetaria, privando con ello a los rebeldes de su ventaja.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

traits.locale_text: El estimado Abelard Werserian propuso utilizar las armas de los rebeldes contra ellos mismos. Su fortaleza residía en las tácticas de guerrilla que empleaban en sus ataques. El estimado Abelard se afirmó en su convicción de que podía inculcar los rudimentos de estas tácticas a los soldados de la guarnición planetaria, privando con ello a los rebeldes de su ventaja.

languages.text: Der geschätzte Abelard Werserian schlug vor, die Waffen der Rebellen gegen sie selbst einzusetzen. Ihre Stärke lag in den Guerilla-Taktiken ihrer Angriffe. Der geschätzte Abelard war überzeugt, er könne den Soldaten der Garnison auf dem Planeten die Grundlagen dieser Taktiken beibringen und somit den Vorteil der Rebellen zunichte machen.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

traits.locale_text: Der geschätzte Abelard Werserian schlug vor, die Waffen der Rebellen gegen sie selbst einzusetzen. Ihre Stärke lag in den Guerilla-Taktiken ihrer Angriffe. Der geschätzte Abelard war überzeugt, er könne den Soldaten der Garnison auf dem Planeten die Grundlagen dieser Taktiken beibringen und somit den Vorteil der Rebellen zunichte machen.

languages.text: L'honorable Abélard Werserian proposa de retourner les armes des rebelles contre eux. Comme leur force résidait dans les tactiques de guérilla furtives employées lors de leurs attaques, le sénéchal était convaincu de pouvoir enseigner les bases de ces techniques aux soldats de la garnison planétaire afin de neutraliser l'avantage des rebelles.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

traits.locale_text: L'honorable Abélard Werserian proposa de retourner les armes des rebelles contre eux. Comme leur force résidait dans les tactiques de guérilla furtives employées lors de leurs attaques, le sénéchal était convaincu de pouvoir enseigner les bases de ces techniques aux soldats de la garnison planétaire afin de neutraliser l'avantage des rebelles.

languages.text: Muhterem Abelard Werserian, isyancıları kendi tuzaklarına düşürmeyi teklif etti. İsyancıların gücü, gizli gerilla taktiğinden gelmekteydi. Muhterem Abelard, gezegen garnizonlarındaki askerlere bu taktikleri temel düzeyde öğretebileceğini ve isyancıları ellerindeki avantajdan yoksun bırakabileceğini ifade etti.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Abelard Werserian proposed using the rebels' own weapons against them. Their strength lay in the covert guerrilla tactics of their attacks. The esteemed Abelard expressed his conviction that he could teach the basics of these tactics to the soldiers of the planetary garrison, eliminating the rebels' advantage.

Muhterem Abelard, gezegen garnizonlarındaki askerlere bu taktikleri temel düzeyde öğretebileceğini ve isyancıları ellerindeki avantajdan yoksun bırakabileceğini ifade etti.
